TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AutomationElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 UI 自动化树中的一个 UI 自动化元素，并包含由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序用作标识符的值。

span.span: Represents a UI Automation element in the UI Automation tree, and contains values used as identifiers by UI Automation client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对应于一种[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，不管基础实现 (如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)])。An corresponds to a piece of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], regardless of underlying implementation (such as [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]).

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效标识符。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in . 此外可以从检索此属性或属性。This property can also be retrieved from the or properties. 返回属性的值属于类型。Return values of the property are of type . 属性的默认值为一个空字符串。The default value for the property is an empty string. 当它可用时的元素应始终为应用程序而不考虑本地语言的任何实例中相同。When it is available the of an element is expected to always be the same in any instance of the application regardless of the local language. 值应该是唯一的而同级元素但不是一定是唯一跨整个桌面。The value should be unique among sibling elements but not necessarily unique across the entire desktop. 例如，应用程序的多个实例或在 Microsoft Windows 资源管理器的多个文件夹视图可能包含具有相同的元素，如"SystemMenuBar"。For example, multiple instances of an application, or multiple folder views in Microsoft Windows Explorer, may contain elements with the same , such as "SystemMenuBar". 尽管支持始终在此属性不强制性更好的可测试性，建议。While support of an is always recommended for better testability, this property is not mandatory. 只要它受支持，创建测试自动化脚本，而不考虑 UI 语言运行时很有用。Where it is supported, an is useful for creating test automation scripts that run regardless of UI language. 客户端应进行任何假设有关由其他应用程序公开的 s。Clients should make no assumptions regarding the s exposed by other applications. 不一定能保证跨不同版本保持不变或生成的应用程序。An is not necessarily guaranteed to be stable across different releases or builds of an application. 实例[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素唯一标识的桌面上通过其属性。Instances of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are uniquely identified on the desktop by their properties. > [!NOTE] > 除顶级应用程序窗口，派生自的 UI 自动化元素的控件视图中的所有 UI 自动化元素都支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]没有 ID 或 X:uid，以及派生自的 UI 自动化元素的控件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]控件没有控件 id。 is supported by all UI Automation elements in the control view except top-level application windows, UI Automation elements derived from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] controls that do not have an ID or x:Uid, and UI Automation elements derived from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] controls that do not have a control ID. ## Examples 下面的示例检索的属性的当前值。The following example retrieves the current value of the property. 如果该元素未提供，则返回默认值。The default value is returned if the element does not provide one. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的集合的视图由条件，处于活动状态时这获取对象。The view of the returned collection is determined by the condition of the that was active when this object was obtained. 仅当缓存子级的作用域包含， ，或。Children are cached only if the scope of the included , , or . 如果指定，子级已缓存在此级别，但没有子节点，则此属性的值为 0。If the specified that children were to be cached at this level, but there are no children, then the value of this property is 0. 但是，如果不会发出请求，已在此级别的缓存子级，尝试检索该属性将引发异常。However, if no request was made to cache children at this level, an attempt to retrieve the property raises an exception. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，列表框元素获取从父窗口元素时处于活动状态和是。In the following example, a list box element is obtained from the parent window element while a is active and is . 子元素 （即，列表项） 的指定的属性存储在缓存中，并且可以从检索列表框。The specified properties of the child elements (that is, the list items) are stored in the cache and can be retrieved from the of the list box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是完全遮盖住的另一个窗口的情况下可单击。An is not clickable if it is completely obscured by another window. 满足以下所有条件时可单击：An is clickable when it satisfies all the following conditions: - 它是以编程方式可见的且适用于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树。It is programmatically visible and available with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. - 它完全滚动到视图中其父容器中，如果有的话。It is scrolled fully into view within its parent container, if any. 如果元素剪辑，则它是可单击不能保证。If the element is clipped, there is no guarantee that it is clickable. - 此元素不遮盖由任何其他 UI 元素。The element is not obscured by any other UI element. 如果此元素部分遮盖由其祖先以外一些 UI 元素，则可能不是可单击。If the element is partially obscured by some UI element other than its ancestors, it might not be clickable. - 必须可单击本身包含元素的窗口。The window containing the element must itself be clickable. 例如，如果包含窗口是完全透明，则不可单击的窗口。For example, the window is not clickable if the containing window is completely transparent. 鼠标单击将透过它单击到下面的窗口，因此透明窗口内的任何控件不会返回可单击的点。Mouse clicks will click through to the window underneath, so any controls within the transparent window will not return clickable points. - 如果元素是一个容器 （如列表或树视图），它必须有一个点，当单击将导致控件获得焦点的背景。If the element is a container (such as list or tree view), it must have a point that when clicked will cause the background of the control to be focused. 如果容器控件的每个部分占用遭到一个子元素，它不是可单击。If every part of the container control is occupied by a child element, it is not clickable. 存在是没有保证的控件将执行任何操作时单击的点定义为可单击由 UI 自动化提供程序。There is no guarantee that a control will do anything when clicked on a point defined as clickable by the UI Automation provider. 请考虑改为使用控件模式来对控件执行操作。Consider using control patterns instead to perform actions on controls. ## Examples 以下代码检索的控件可单击的点，并将系统光标移动到该点。The following code retrieves a clickable point for a control and moves the system cursor to that point. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#179](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#179)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#179](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#179)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效标识符。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in . 很多个元素的可见性信息已更改时，此事件将引发由元素的容器。This event is raised by a container of elements whenever the visibility information of many elements has changed. 此事件由客户端用作一个指示符，它需要刷新和它可能已缓存了树中的元素的信息。This event is used by the client as an indicator that it needs to refresh the and information that it may have cached for elements within the tree. 建议的更改数量触发此事件为 25。The recommended number of changes that triggers this event is 25.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用的根元素作为起始点查找其他元素中，使用和方法。You can use the root element as a starting point for finding other elements, using the and methods. 在搜索时从根元素，请务必指定范围中的搜索，不。When searching from the root element, be sure to specify in the scope of the search, not . 通过桌面的整个子树的搜索可能循环访问数千个项，并导致堆栈溢出。A search through the entire subtree of the desktop could iterate through thousands of items and lead to a stack overflow. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索所有桌面的直接子级的集合。The following example code retrieves a collection of all the immediate children of the desktop.
